video.title: Undercover Law
video.synopsis: Female intelligence agents infiltrate the disparate aspects of a Colombian cartel in an attempt to take down the drug lords and their associates.

episodes.synopsis: Undercover agent Amelia returns from the jungle with unsettling video footage, sparking a new operation. Arrested drug mule Alejandra is offered a deal.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Sandra and Coyote start their undercover life together. Alejandra tries to convince Diego to involve her more directly in the drug dealing.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana's husband gets frustrated by her job. Alejandra attempts to plant a camera. Sandra's father makes a suggestion.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra's custody of her niece is put in jeopardy. Coyote and Sandra work to find Binoche's vice. Amelia is pressured to talk about why she left.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana interferes with Jennifer's love life. Alejandra is invited to an important event, but is torn about what to do.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The ladies report back on what they've uncovered. Kimberly questions Alejandra's plan. Tatiana is saddened by thoughts of her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Amelia's cooking becomes crucial to her mission, and she also worries about her mother's health. Coyote confronts Sandra about her son.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana must improvise to delay Halcón and ends up getting closer to him as a result. Alejandra feels bitter about Diego's betrayal.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Sandra and Coyote extend an offer to Catalina to join their business. Amelia makes a startling discovery. Alejandra searches for her sister.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana get into trouble during her trip. Sandra issues an ultimatum involving Lucas. Amelia gathers more intel as she's closely watched.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra's information leads the cops to a drug warehouse. Sandra and Coyote try to figure out what Blue Fish means.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana struggles to cope with what happened to her. Coyote bonds with Lucas at a special soccer game. Alejandra mourns her loss.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra meets with Ronaldo. Catalina gives Coyote her response about the business proposal. Amelia asks for help.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Four targets from Operation Phoenix come together and the team rejoices, until everything is suddenly put at risk.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra has an important decision to make. Binoche's wife and sister-in-law worry about his whereabouts. Amelia reports back.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Coyote offers Sandra a solution for what to do with Lucas. Tatiana works to cover up the GPS she planted in Halcón's watch.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana decides to take her undercover role in a new direction. Coyote accuses Sandra of being jealous of Catalina.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra becomes more invested as she continues her training. Bertha calls Sandra out on her feelings. Tatiana tries to get closer to Halcón.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Amelia angers Bigotes. Lerner Junior surprises everyone with his next move. Lucas finds an old photograph and shows it to Bertha.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Sandra worries about Genoveva's mental state. Bigotes grants Amelia a phone call. Bertha highlights the connection Lucas and Coyote have.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Porto asks Alejandra to complete one final task to earn her diploma. Binoche becomes suspicious of his neighbor.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Coyote, Bertha and Lucas are all concerned about Sandra. Tatiana is wracked with guilt about Jennifer. Amelia is put in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Genoveva tells her husband she doesn't trust him. Coyote takes a huge risk while searching for Sandra. Alejandra reunites with Martín.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Halcón becomes distraught over what Tatiana tells him about Jennifer. Lerner Junior catches up with his father's old friends.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Riddled with paranoia, Halcón turns his suspicions on Tatiana. When Lucas has problems at school, Coyote offers to help him.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana's husband expresses his concern. Amelia helps Bigotes to seek medical attention. Kimberly runs away in search of her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Sandra is asked once again about the identity of Lucas's father. Alejandra worries the Mexican cartel isn't buying her story. Amelia returns home.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra's constant phone calls create suspicion. Tatiana's husband asks about Eduardo. Porto attempts to convince Amelia to stay in the job.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Sandra and Coyote open their bar as they continue to lure in Lerner Junior. Alejandra has major issues in Mexico.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Halcón tries to win back Tatiana's trust. Coyote surprises Sandra with a special gift while she looks into something without his knowledge.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Bigotes hosts a meeting with Lerner Junior at Amelia's house. Martín is still not convinced that Juan Pablo and Laura are trustworthy.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Checho becomes protective of Amelia. Bertha makes Coyote doubt his proposal. Halcón opens up to Tatiana about his new feelings toward the drug business.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Bautista attempts to become more directly involved in the business. Bigotes takes his anger out on Amelia and violence ensues.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: The team reels from the events involving Bigotes. Tatiana looks deeper into the disappearance of her father. Junior meets with the Mexican cartel.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Amelia is shocked by what the doctor tells her. Junior scolds Martín for what happened with Alejandra. Kimberly and Lucas befriend each other.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: News about the deaths of the Mexican drug cartel leaders hits the television. Sandra receives the genetic test results. Tatiana makes a breakthrough.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana's mother is surprised by who her daughter brings home. Binoche becomes jealous of Catalina. Sandra stresses over the paternity results.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Halcón feels cooped up. Tatiana's husband, Manolo, raises his suspicions with Porto, who decides to investigate further.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Sandra's guilt overwhelms her. Tatiana's father goes to a psychological clinic. Alejandra becomes fed up with remaining in hiding.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Genoveva overhears a devastating conversation and is inconsolable. Amelia speaks with a doctor about her options.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Sandra and Coyote take advantage of Genoveva's anger at Binoche and carry out a new plan. Junior tells Halcón about his new role in the organization.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Amelia's secret gets out and she admits her fears to María Emma. Alejandra hears tragic news. Bertha dives deeper into the investigation.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana says goodbye to Manolo. Genoveva makes a decision about turning in her husband and sister. Martín and Junior worry about their future.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Coyote makes a meaningful proposal to Sandra. Tatiana defends Halcón to María Emma. Martín and Junior panic about Binoche's disappearance.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana's father finally recognizes her. Coyote and Lucas have an emotional conversation just before the boy is removed from the operation.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Amelia is proud of Checho. Junior concocts a plan to go after Binoche while he is being transferred. Sandra and Coyote start the adoption process.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Porto asks Sandra and Coyote to continue their mission. Tatiana worries about her father's mental state after finding out about his PTSD.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Coyote agrees to do one last job for the DPI. Halcón fears for his life when his shipment gets seized. Bertha and Alejandra work together.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana decides to make a confession to Halcón. Bertha helps Alejandra plan her new identity. Porto gives Sandra tragic news.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: The DPI gather together to pay their respects. Amelia and Checho continue to work on their operation. An injured Bautista seeks refuge.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Sandra makes a very risky decision. Porto resigns from the DPI. Halcón summons Tatiana to meet up with him. Martín and Junior argue.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra investigates around Paloma's house. Sandra continues to insist she did not know what Coyote was doing.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Porto tells Alejandra about his counterintelligence surveillance plan. Halcón begins working with Tatiana. Amelia spies on Ibana.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra's time with Porto puts her mission with Paloma in jeopardy. Tatiana opens up to Halcón about her marriage. Junior begins to doubt Martín.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra's drug-filled night results in important information that could help determine who the DPI mole is. Tatiana worries about Halcón.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Andrea is discharged from rehab and wants to take Kimberly with her to live with her daughter's grandparents. Porto confronts María Emma.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra finds Paloma in a dangerous state. Tatiana goes undercover as Halcón's fiancée, but Martín advises Junior not to trust them.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana comes across Sandra while Halcón and Martín fight. Bautista goes after Checho and threatens Amelia. Alejandra searches Paloma's apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Amelia and Bautista face off, with Ivana in the cross hairs. Sandra finally gets to meet Blue Fish. The DPI mole is discovered.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: The undercover agents work to pull of their most dangerous mission yet: going after Junior at Halcón and Tatiana's fake wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 60
